analysis.Summary: This Vue component renders and manages a playlist creation form. It collects playlist title, description, privacy setting, and cover image, performs simple validation, submits data via a store action, and emits events on success or cancellation.
analysis.Purpose: To provide a reusable UI form for creating new music playlists in the 'music' module of the application.

Components.name: Field
Components.responsibility: Renders a text or textarea input with built-in validation feedback.

Components.name: Radio
Components.responsibility: Renders a radio button for selecting privacy (public/private).

Components.name: Button
Components.responsibility: Renders actionable buttons (Cancel/Create) with loaders and success indicators.

Components.name: UploadImage
Components.responsibility: Handles image selection and upload, binding the resulting URL to the form.

Components.name: Media
Components.responsibility: Displays an image preview when a coverUrl is present.

Components.name: IconMusic
Components.responsibility: Shows a placeholder icon when no cover image is selected.

Functions.name: submitForm
Functions.description: Validates the form, constructs a playlist payload including creator and owner metadata, invokes the store action to create the playlist, and emits a 'created' event with the result.

analysis.Usage: Imported into a parent view or route component where playlist creation is needed. Listens for 'created' to refresh state or navigate, and 'cancel' to close the form or reset UI.
Notes: Uses Vue 3 <script setup> and reactive state for form and validation errors.
Only title field is validated; additional validation could be added for other fields.
Default form properties include isCollaborative and tracks, though they are not currently exposed in the UI.
CSS classes appear to rely on a global utility/CSS framework, no scoped <style> block present.
